solution_line_template: There are {other_people}+{james}=<<{other_people}+{james}={total_people}>>{total_people} people in the house
So they drink {total_people}*{cups_per_person_per_day}=<<{total_people}*{cups_per_person_per_day}={cups_per_day}>>{cups_per_day} cups of coffee a day
That means they use {cups_per_day}*{ounces_per_cup}=<<{cups_per_day}*{ounces_per_cup}={ounces_per_day}>>{ounces_per_day} ounces of coffee a day
So they use {ounces_per_day}*{days_per_week}=<<{ounces_per_day}*{days_per_week}={ounces_per_week}>>{ounces_per_week} ounces of coffee a week
